channel.title: Xbl mw2 questions
channel.description:
Got xbl? Got mw2?
Whats your rank, prestige, and gamertag?
Gt = Kill Fame
Rank = 35
Prestige = first prestige
Whats your kill streak, etc..
Well I normally use harriers, ac130/chopper gunner, nuke.
Best kill streak = 43 kills 1 death due to my nuke.
All my perks are pro IV or higher..
Mastered weapons?
M4A1 = 987 kills with it.
I always use the m4A1 with silencer and scavenger pro..
I always go positive, normally I get to like a 20 kill streak before a sniper watchs for me..
I am ranked in the 600k's...
I normally play when ever I can.. Anyone can add me, I will play any game.
I have a mic, and I normally play ground war with a full team of friends.. We always win, Best win streak was 23 I think.
Your turn. Basically do what I did, and add anything else you want..
This is for xbox's only..None of that ps3 shit.

item.title: Xbl mw2 questions
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

[quote=“Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS, post:15, topic:326538”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=422951.msg3105764#msg3105764 date=1264121051]

Gt = Infinity Ward

Rank = 70

Prestige = 10th prestiege

Whats your kill streak, etc…

Well I normally use every perk

Best kill streak = infinate sign (:))

Every perk is pro

Mastered weapons?

All of them

I always use the ump with fmj

I always go perfect (meaning no deaths unless a nuke)

I am ranked in the 300s…

*Note my xBox has been modded with my OWN made mods. L()lZ

modding 10th prestige takes 5 minutes
[/quote]

Yea, but I made other mods :p[/quote]
dude stop lying ur not lvl 10th prestige cuz u aint got nuthin on canownueasy…

Read full topic

item.title: Xbl mw2 questions
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:5, topic:326538”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=422951.msg3104964#msg3104964 date=1264051396]
I use fng for title and dog tags for emblem hahaha. or i use the chicken butt for emblem. ill add u tonight but ill play tomorrow ight? i got a mic 2

edit:: k i sent u a friend request
[/quote]
K I will be on tomorrow about 4pm central. I will accept ur request tonight.

And lol I see a lot of people using the dog tags and fng to make people think a low level owned them…

Earlier I got asked why I got a commander title and 5 stars for my emblem if I am only level 35… I just laughed =] and my friend said “cuz he is prestiging dip shit”[/quote]hahaha fail for noob

Read full topic
